app.title: MyFarm

workshops.hostDescription: Share your agricultural expertise with farmers around the world.

events.climateSmartDesc: Learn techniques to adapt your farming practices to changing climate conditions.
events.pestManagementDesc: Live Q&A with agricultural experts on integrated pest management.

events.waterConservationDesc: Practical methods to reduce water usage while maintaining crop yields.
